Method Detail

loadBoundingBox

MemoryDataSet loadBoundingBox(double minLat,
                              double minLon,
                              double maxLat,
                              double maxLon)
Parameters:
minLat - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
maxLat - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
minLon - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
maxLon - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
Returns:
the file-content or null

loadPlanet

MemoryDataSet loadPlanet()
Returns:
the file-content or null

loadAllNodes

ReleasableIterator<Node> loadAllNodes()
Returns:
all nodes from the database.

loadAllNodesInBoundingBox

ReleasableIterator<Node> loadAllNodesInBoundingBox(double minLat,
                                                   double minLon,
                                                   double maxLat,
                                                   double maxLon)
Parameters:
minLat - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
maxLat - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
minLon - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
maxLon - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
Returns:
all nodes from the database that are within the bouding-box.

loadNode

Node loadNode(long nodeID)
Parameters:
nodeID - read only the one node with this ID.
Returns:
the node

loadRelation

Relation loadRelation(long relationID)
Parameters:
relationID - read only the one relation with this ID.
Returns:
the node

loadAllWays

ReleasableIterator<Way> loadAllWays()
Load all ways from the database.

Returns:
the ways.

loadAllWaysInBoundingBox

ReleasableIterator<Way> loadAllWaysInBoundingBox(double minLat,
                                                 double minLon,
                                                 double maxLat,
                                                 double maxLon)
Load all ways from the database.

Parameters:
minLat - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
maxLat - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
minLon - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
maxLon - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
Returns:
all ways from the database that are within the bouding-box.

loadWay

Way loadWay(long aWayID)
Get the specified way.

Parameters:
aWayID - the id of the way to load
Returns:
the way

loadWaysForNode

ReleasableIterator<Way> loadWaysForNode(long aNodeID)
Get all ways that contain the given node.

Parameters:
aNodeID - the id of the node to load the ways for
Returns:
the ways

loadNodesByName

ReleasableIterator<Node> loadNodesByName(java.lang.String aLookFor)
Parameters:
aLookFor - a name or ref to look for
Returns:
all nodes with that name or ref

loadWaysByName

ReleasableIterator<Way> loadWaysByName(java.lang.String aLookFor,
                                       double minLat,
                                       double minLon,
                                       double maxLat,
                                       double maxLon)
Parameters:
aLookFor - a name or ref to look for
minLat - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
maxLat - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
minLon - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
maxLon - only the elements within/intersecting this bounding-box will be returned
Returns:
all ways with that name or ref

loadWaysByName

ReleasableIterator<Way> loadWaysByName(java.lang.String aLookFor)
Parameters:
aLookFor - a name or ref to look for
Returns:
all ways with that name or ref

aNode - add this way to the database

createRelation

void createRelation(Relation aRelation)
Parameters:
aRelation - add this relation to the database

loadWaysByTag

ReleasableIterator<Way> loadWaysByTag(java.lang.String aKey,
                                      java.lang.String aValue)
Parameters:
aKey - a key to look for
aValue - (may be null) a value for the give key to look for
Returns:
all ways containing the given key (with the given value is specified)

loadNodesByTag

ReleasableIterator<Node> loadNodesByTag(java.lang.String aKey,
                                        java.lang.String aValue)
Parameters:
aKey - a key to look for
aValue - (may be null) a value for the give key to look for
Returns:
all nodes containing the given key (with the given value is specified)

Commit and checkpoint the database.

shutdown

Properly relase all ressources.
